data.title: Urban Governance and Public Policies in Portugal
data.meta_description: This paper delves into the evolving landscape of urban governance and public policies in Portugal, examining their role in shaping cities from 2000 to 2030. This study scrutinizes the transformative shift towards inclusive governance paradigms. Emphasizing...
